body_html: ArgumentSpec/ArgumentInfo is only used for specializations for Tensor types and tuples containing tensor types. You should not have to modify it to support at::Device. Try looking at another type such as StringType to see what gets modified to add a type.
body_text: ArgumentSpec/ArgumentInfo is only used for specializations for Tensor types and tuples containing tensor types. You should not have to modify it to support at::Device.  Try looking at another type such as StringType to see what gets modified to add a type.
body: ArgumentSpec/ArgumentInfo is only used for specializations for Tensor types and tuples containing tensor types. You should not have to modify it to support at::Device.  Try looking at another type such as `StringType` to see what gets modified to add a type.
